title: Change in Metabolic Markers and the Risk of Skin Cancer: Results from the Lifelines Cohort Study in the Netherlands
details: M Shimelash, G Sidorenkov, B van der Vegt, M Jalving… - … Epidemiology, Biomarkers & …, 2025
abstract: Background: Skin-cancers are the most common cancers in Caucasians, and their incidence is rising. Although metabolic and anthropometric markers play a role in cancer development, the relationship of metabolic and anthropometric changes with …
